text: Michael "Mick" Wingert (born July 4, 1974) is an American stand-up comedian, voice actor, comedian, and actor. He is best known as the new voice of Master Po in Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness. He took over from Po's original voice actor Jack Black. And he's also the Theme song singer of: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness. ==Early life== Wingert was born Michael Wingert in Lemoore, California. ==Filmography== Year Title Role Notes 2010 Kung Fu Panda Holiday Various voices Made for television 2011-present Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness Po and the Theme song singer Television series ==Video games== Year Title Role Notes 2008 Kung Fu Panda Po Replacing Jack Black 2011 Kung Fu Panda 2 Po Replacing Jack Black ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American voice actors Category:American stand-up comedians Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from California Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Comedians from California
title: Mick Wingert
